===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=32|rad=土|as=13|sn=16|four=46141|canj=GWLJ|ids=⿰土睪}}

# [[road]], [[path]], [[way]]
# [[journey]]
# [[course]]

====Usage notes====
The 墿 character has a specific reading ([[tú]]) that refers to being an archaic variant of [[途]]; all three definition entries apply to that reading. 墿 also simply means [[道路]] ([[yì]]), which only applies to the first definition entry.
